titles.title: Mesa Verde National Park Boundary Expansion Act of 2006
A bill to modify the boundary of Mesa Verde National Park, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 6/29/2006--Introduced. Mesa Verde National Park Boundary Expansion Act of 2006 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified land adjacent to the Mesa Verde National Park in Colorado or an interest in such land for addition to the Park. Revises the boundary of the Park to reflect the acquisition of such land. Requires the Secretary to administer any land or interest in land acquired under this Act as part of the Park.
